Torca looked at Perceptor for a long moment, "Yes." he said finally,
speaking more to Kup than to Perceptor. "We shall wait for the repairs
to be complete." He turned and looked at Kup and the others, "Then we
have many other things to discuss."

Bantor walked up the hall towards where Eilta and the others were
standing. looking at the repairs. It was becoming quite crowded in the
observation room, all these maximals crowded into it to watch the
progress. Even Lord Elder and Cheetor were watching, although they
were simply monitoring it from the bridge of the ship rather than
standing in the observation room. Somebody had to keep an eye on
sensors while all this was going on.

Then Tuscon's chest began to glow . . .

"Sir" Bump said to Santon as he worked on Rodimus, "Look at Tuscon's chest."

Santon walked over to Tuscon and began to run a scanner over him,
"Interesting." he said, there is an energy wave comming from him."

Legacy glanced over, "It is as predicted." he said, his voice cold and
matter-of-fact. "Tuscon is capable is transmitting a harmonic Amares
wave. From my understanding about it, it is typically a benificial
phenomina for Autobots and Maximals."

Santon was about to nod when the machine monitoring Rodimus began to
chime and warble, Rodimus' spark energy had just dropped off!!

"I thought you said beneficial!" Santon said as he leaped over to
Rodimus in a desperate attempt to restart his systems.

Legacy said nothing as he too attpemted to revive Rodimus.

(TAG)

Preston
